title: Searching for a Diversity of Interpretable Graph Control Policies
details: G Nadizar, E Medvet, D Wilson - Proceedings of the Genetic and Evolutionary …, 2024
abstract: Graph-based Genetic Programming (GGP) can create interpretable control policies in graph form, but faces challenges such as local optima and solution fragility, which undermine its efficacy. Quality-Diversity (QD) has been effective in addressing similar …
